title: Energetic Heavy Rock
description: High-Quality Original Music from professional composers, designed for use in Video Games. Features 12 Original tracks, converted into 184 sound files, tailor-made for Royalty-Free use in Video Games.
longDescription:
https://soundcloud.com/matt-harvey-vgm/sets/raucous-rock-racing-pack


Energetic Heavy Rock is a High-Quality Rock Music pack made by Pro Composers, Instrumentalists, and Producers, especially edited and curated for Video Games. The HUGE collection of 184 wav files and loops gives you full creative control over the music control in your gaming product, like having the music producer in your back pocket, the same way as TV/Film producers and directors do.


========================

MASSIVE CONTENT

========================


From 12 original genuine artistic tracks, written by pro composers and all featuring live instruments, there are 184 Musical Elements for your project, including 116 seamless loops, with a Massive 2 hours and 43 minutes of play time! These can be used for different levels, menu screens, cutaways, and expansion content. If you’re planning multi-level racers, you can change up the music throughout using one of 116 different loops. Urban fighters can ramp up the intensity for boss levels by using heavier track edits, and atmospheric night scenes can add tension and mystery by cutting out heavy drumming or using more atmospheric mixes, like just with bass guitar and drums.


========================

PRO LEVEL MUSIC, INDIE BUDGET

========================


The Music in this Pack has been made by Creators with masses of experience writing Music for High End Media, and has already clocked up thousands of hours on television productions all over the world. The Quality of the Music product, massively increases the Quality of your games.


========================

STYLE AND FEEL 

========================


The tracks in this pack are gritty, fast, punky, chaotic, epic, powerful, driving, authentic, modern rock tracks. Great for a variety of games including racing, action, fighting, battle, and extreme sports. Check the full tracks on Soundcloud : https://soundcloud.com/matt-harvey-vgm/sets/raucous-rock-racing-pack


========================

FULL COLLECTION DETAILS

========================


• 184 original high-quality WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1 kHz)

• 116 seamless loops

• 2 hrs & 43 min. of music

• 3.76 GB of music

• Unlimited Royalty-Free license


========================

ABOUT THE COMPOSER :

========================


Matt Harvey has worked production music for high end media productions for over a decade. He has written for 1000’s of television shows, movies, online streamers, and adverts. His music is heard all over the world by millions. He has a dedicated studio using £1000’s worth of equipment, guitars, hardware, and software. These music products are crafted by a dedicated professional with decades of experience.


This collection is a great way to get Top Level music into your project on an Indie budget.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs : 184

Number of Audio Cues : 184

Sample rate / bit rate : 44.1khz, 16-bit

Does music loop : Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 163

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: All artwork created under license with MidJourney AI. Contains sound samples, used under license.
